about.jakdu: The word "K LEAGUE JAKDU KING" is formed by combining "K LEAGUE", "JAKDU" and "KING" to mean a person who is right about the result of the K league game like he was possessed.
about.jakduk: K LEAGUE JAKDU KING is K League Community. K LEAGUE JAKDU KING will offer the board, match schedule, stats, graph, gallery ans so on using K league contents. Also, I’m planning to offer more contents like soccer betting and encyclopedia that user can participate.
about.contribution: K LEAGUE JAKDU KING is developed using open source like Spring Framework, Bootstrap, AngularJS and so on. Also, K LEAGUE JAKDU KING is open source and anyone can develop using Github.
